>
[Holy Prayer Beads](/Equipment.aspx?ID=256)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 573 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This strand of ordinary-looking prayer beads glows with a soft light and becomes warm to the touch the first time you cast a divine spell while holding it. When you do, the prayer beads become attuned to your deity, changing their form and iconography to prominently incorporate your deity’s religious symbol and iconography. The beads don’t transform or function for an evil spellcaster.

 Whenever you cast a divine spell from your own spell slots while holding the prayer beads, you recover 1 Hit Point; this is a positive healing effect. If the spell you cast was a healing spell, you can grant this additional healing to one of the spell’s targets instead of yourself.

<document level="2" id="action-161" />

**Craft Requirements** You have a spellcasting class feature with the divine tradition.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Holy Prayer Beads
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Holy Prayer Beads (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 573 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You recover 1d4 Hit Points instead of 1 Hit Point when casting divine spells from your spell slots. Change the beads’ list of spells to the 4th-level versions of _bless_, [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) (matching one component of your deity’s alignment), _heal_, [_neutralize poison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=207), and [_remove disease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=251). You can cast each of these once per day.
